m:MaterialTitle.title: Toast
m:MaterialTitle.description: GWT Material provides an easy way for you to send unobtrusive alerts to your users through toasts. These toasts are also placed and sized responsively, try it out by clicking the button below on different device sizes.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Toast with Action
m:MaterialTitle.description: rovides an advance toast with any widget (MaterialLink) for declaration of actions when toast is applied.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Styling Toasts
m:MaterialTitle.description: We've added the ability to customize your toasts easily. You can pass in classes as an optional parameter into the toast function. We've added a rounded class for you, but you can create your own CSS classes and apply them to toasts. Checkout out our full example below.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Toasts with Callback
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can add finishing callbacks to your toasts to invoke actions.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Modals
m:MaterialTitle.description: Use a modal for dialog boxes, confirmation messages, or other content that can be called up. You can set the type by adding, type='DEFAULT, FIXED_FOOTER, BOTTOM_SHEET'

m:MaterialTitle.title: Tooltip
m:MaterialTitle.description: Tooltips are small, interactive, textual hints for mainly graphical elements. When using icons for actions you can use a tooltip to give people clarification on its function.

</m:MaterialTooltip>
